subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Knicks point guard Pablo Prigioni, 35, has played in Spain since 1999 and was a member of Argentina’s 2012 Olympic team with the N.B.A. players Manu Ginobili, Luis Scola and Carlos Delfino.
snippet: Knicks point guard Pablo Prigioni, 35, has played in Spain since 1999 and was a member of Argentina’s 2012 Olympic team with the N.B.A. players Manu Ginobili, Luis Scola and Carlos Delfino.
